title: Festka explains cycling’s bittersweet success during the global coronavirus crisis & boom
content:
Michael Moureček, the co-founder of Czech premium custom bike maker Festka puts into words what we’ve all been experiencing… an ongoing global coronavirus pandemic that has harshly impacted the lives of almost everyone in the world. Yet in the end, the cycling industry seems to be reaping great benefits from a boom in interest. But […]

The post Festka explains cycling’s bittersweet success during the global coronavirus crisis & boom appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
